name: TIME MACHINE (itch) (VRDUDE)
description:
YOU are a very sad and lonely time traveler, who wishes that they could go back in time and correct the problems in the past which lead to the ... pitiful, sorrowful, miserable existence, that you have now.

HOWEVER, you accidentally took your time machine to an area of the universe known as The Empuzzled Ministry of The Damned.  As such your time machine can only function in traveling back into the past.  Where you helplessly witness yourself making the same mistakes over and over and over and over again, like you are stuck in a loop.

The only way to escape The Empuzzled Ministry of The Damned is to use your past self as a tool to move forward.

Leverage your actions of the past!   Enjoy!
